sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>history</radical> radical and the <kanji>history</kanji> kanji are the same.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>History</kanji> was full of famous <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>). Sure there are people and stuff, but historical sheep are where it's at. There's the famous sheep samurai, the death sheep who works for the yakuza, just tons!
readingInfo: Look at a history book, behind each of those humans was a sheep, changing the world as we know it.
